info.summary:
Emanuele Della Valle works as a Assistant Professor in Department of Electronics, Information and Bioengineering of the Politecnico di Milano, and his\her h-index is 30, g-index is 55. His\Her interests are :
 Semantic Web; Web Service; Stream Reasoning; Search Engine; Business Process;
